module.name: Bulk Extensions
module.description: Bulk Extensions uses CSV files to import and export of extensions.
module.changelog: *2.5.0* Version for FreePBX 2.5 *0.2.1* Beta support for FreePBX 2.5 (unreleased) *0.2.0* New feature - Export Extensions Documented all supported Extension fields Minor code clean ups *0.1.1* Fixed bad path and error in tar file *0.1* First release
